text:
<http://status.aws.amazon.com/|Informational message: Elevated API Error Rates>
We are investigating increased API error rates in the US-EAST-1 Region.

<http://status.aws.amazon.com/|Service is operating normally: [RESOLVED] Elevated API Error Rates>
Between 8:35 PM and 9:32 PM PDT we experienced increased API error rates in the US-EAST-1 Region. The issue has been resolved and the service is operating normally.

<http://status.aws.amazon.com/|Informational message: Increased Error Rates and Latencies>
We are investigating increased error rates and latency in creating new IAM roles in the US-EAST-1 Region and we continue working towards resolution. Previously created roles are not impacted.

<http://status.aws.amazon.com/|Informational message: Increased Error Rates and Latencies>
We are continuing to investigate increased error rates and latency in creating new IAM roles in the US-EAST-1 Region and we continue working towards resolution. Previously created roles are not impacted.

<http://status.aws.amazon.com/|Informational message: Increased Latency for Cluster Creation>
We are investigating increased latency for the creation of Redshift clusters in the US-EAST-1 Region. Existing clusters are not impacted.
